channel.title: Thanksgiving on cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Thanksgiving on cookbook

item.title: Gravy
item.description: Ingredients From Turkey Bacon Roasted onion Roasted orange Fresh ingredients Rosemarry 3 chpoped tomatoes Dry cider Chicken stock Methodology Cooking Instructions Put the used roasting tray from turkey back on the heat. Chopped bacon and onion to tray. Add lemon, rosemary, and tomatoes. Cut trimmings off turkey (wings and tail), add to the tray. Add dry cider. Once reduceing, add resting juices from turkey Once reduced by half, mash the vegetables.

item.title: Stuffing
item.description: Ingredients 750g pork sausage 2 onions choppes sage zest of lemon 200g chestnust 100g white breadcrumbs 2 apples 2 eggs salt pepper Methodology Cook onions in butter. Add lemon zest and sage. Mix in other ingrdients. Cook

item.title: Stuffing
item.description: Ingredients 1.5 loaves of Italian bread (24 oz.), cubed (0.5"-1") and dried for 1-2 days 1 cup of butter 2 cups onion, diced 0.5 cup fresh parsley 3 tbsp fresh sage 2 tbsp fresh thyme 1 tbsp fresh rosemary 2.5-3 cups of turkey stock 3 eggs salt Methodology Dry out your cubed bread for 1 day if not 2. Otherwise, bake at 250° F for 45-60 minutes in a dry pan.

item.title: Turkey
item.description: Ingredients Turkey Butter 2 onions 1 orange bay leaves Bacon Olive oil Methodology Prep Defrost in refrigerator. Season the cavity with salt and pepper. Place two halved onions, and an orange and bay leaf to the cavity. Push butter under the skin being careful not the break the skin. Cover the skin with butter and drizzle of olive oil. Cooking Instructions Pre-heat the oven to 425F Cook the oven at 425F for 10 minutes.
